metadata.title: CVE-2017-14640 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in AP4_AtomSampleTable::GetSamplein Core/Ap4AtomSampleTable.cpp in Bento4 version 1.5.0-617. Thevulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, whichleads to remote denial of service.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
